person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: German Axel Schulz outpointed Cuba 's Jose Ribalta in their International Boxing Federation non-title 10-round heavyweight fight on Saturday .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| German Axel Schulz |
| Cuba's Jose Ribalta |

In this paragraph, there are two "Person" entities: "German Axel Schulz" and "Cuba's Jose Ribalta." Both are mentioned in relation to their boxing match.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| German Axel Schulz |
| Jose Ribalta |

In this paragraph, there are two "Person" entities: "German Axel Schulz" and "Jose Ribalta." I have removed "Cuba's" from the second entity, as it is a nationality identifier and not part of the person's name.
